name: Everstab LS292/765
description: EVERSTAB LS-292/765 may be used after adequate testing for applications such as: automotive coatings; coil coatings; wood stains or do-it-yourself paints; radiation curable coatings. Its high efficiency has been demonstrated in coatings based on a variety of binders such as: one and two-component polyurethanes; thermoplastic acrylics (physical drying); thermosetting acrylics; alkyds and polyesters; alkyds (air drying); water borne acrylics; phenolics, vinylics; radiation curable acrylics.
